I've got problems while trying to make Cactus
(http://jakarta.apache.org/ca=
ctus/) work with JUnit 4.0.

To make it work I have to inherit my tests fro=
m ServletTestCase. And
after doing that my test methods do not work! They s=
impky are not
recognized by tests runner. In debugger I saw rhis:
org.junit=
.internal.runners.OldTestClassRunner. So I think this is the
root of the pr=
oblem - old test runner is called. Because he runner is
not old while runni=
ng usual tests and there are no provblems with it.

The question is what is=
 the solution.
